abstract: Anaheim Ducks sign four-year contract with forward Carl Hagelin; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Anaheim Ducks agreed to a four-year, $16 million deal with Hagelin, a restricted free agent they acquired in June in a trade with the Rangers.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Ducks Sign Hagelin

snippet: The Anaheim Ducks agreed to a four-year, $16 million deal with Hagelin, a restricted free agent they acquired in June in a trade with the Rangers.
